## Classes

### <a name="test"></a>`test`

It makes a personalisable greeting message.

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include test
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `test` class:

* [`who`](#who)

##### <a name="who"></a>`who`

Data type: `String`

for whom the message is to be personalised

Default value: `'World'`
